ItemCreateDialog.title: Add Item
ItemCreateDialog.description: Add a new item in the inventory.
ItemCreateDialog.failure_message: Failed to create item. Please try again.

ItemEditDialog.title: Edit Item
ItemEditDialog.description: Update the details for this item.
ItemEditDialog.failure_message: Failed to update item. Please try again.

ItemDeleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
ItemDeleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete the item(s). This action cannot be undone.
ItemDeleteDialog.failure_message: Failed to delete item(s). Please try again.
